name: @tech-of-tempo/memberzone-module
description: A reusable Memberzone component library for Nuxt 3
author: Fikry Ramadhana

scripts.dev: npm run dev:prepare && nuxi dev playground
scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
